title: 为什么对潘马斯的作物右键就会崩溃
author: 坑爹小涵
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  JechCore (JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-3.3.0.jar)
  CoreMod (Aroma1997Core-1.12.2-2.0.0.0.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

replies.txt_content: 好像是无法获得其属性， JechCore 和CoreMod冲突了，额，自己找办法吧，我一个萌新不懂

replies.txt_content: 对植物魔法的花右键也会崩溃
